thread.title: Quirky ad wins awards and Chinese tourists (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Quirky ad wins awards and Chinese tourists (VIDEO)

title: Quirky ad wins awards and Chinese tourists (VIDEO)
text:
Quirky ad wins awards and Chinese tourists (VIDEO) Wednesday July 1, 201501:47 PM GMT+8 ICYMI Print Article 
LONDON, July 1 — A hilarious ad campaign targetting Chinese tourists has not only succeeded in increasing tourist visits, but also won awards. Ogilvy & Mathers won two gold PR Lions as well as one Silver at the Cannes Lions awards, a prestigious awards event for achievements in advertising. 
Among the quirky suggestions in the ad was renaming Sherwood Forest “The Forest of Chivalrous Thieves”, all part of the Visit Britain campaign. 
Nearly 30 million Chinese watched the launch video, a great success by any measure. The quirky campaign had people suggest new names for popular British landmarks. — O&M screencap More Stories for You:
